## ðŸ”§ HOW TO USE THIS TEMPLATE

1. **Attach 5-10 images** (social media screenshots from official sports accounts)
2. **Copy the prompt below** (Basic or Advanced version)
3. **Paste into chat** and submit
4. **Receive your newsletter** as a .md file in ~3-5 minutes

## ðŸ“ CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS

### Change Publication Name
Replace "UPSHOT - Sporty Curation Mag" with:
- **TechPulse** (for tech industry news)
- **FinanceWeekly** (for financial markets)
- **CultureBrief** (for arts/entertainment)
- **[Your Brand Name]** (custom publication)

### Adjust Word Count
- **Quick Brief:** 1,500 words (3 headlines)
- **Standard:** 3,000 words (5 headlines)
- **Deep Dive:** 5,000+ words (7-8 headlines with extended analysis)

### Focus Areas (Pick One or More)
- â›·ï¸ Winter Sports (skiing, snowboarding, ice sports)
- ðŸƒ Summer Sports (athletics, swimming, cycling)
- âš½ Football/Soccer (FIFA, UEFA, continental competitions)
- ðŸ€ Basketball (FIBA, EuroLeague - not NBA)
- ðŸ Volleyball, Handball, Rugby (international only)
- ðŸ… Olympics & Paralympics (year-round coverage)
- ðŸŽ® Esports (international tournaments)

### Time Sensitivity
Add to prompt:
- "Focus on content from **January 14-19, 2026**"
- "Cover **last 72 hours** of social media activity"
- "Analyze **upcoming week** (January 20-26)"

### Platform Focus
Add to prompt:
- "Prioritize content from: Instagram, TikTok, X (Twitter)"
- "Include LinkedIn posts from sports organizations"
- "Focus on official YouTube announcements"

## ðŸ“‹ CHECKLIST BEFORE SUBMITTING

Before you paste the prompt, verify:

- [ ] Attached 5-10 clear images (screenshots from official accounts work best)
- [ ] Images show dates/timestamps (helps with verification)
- [ ] Images include captions/text (not just photos)
- [ ] Specified date range or "last 3 days"
- [ ] Chosen focus area (winter sports / Olympics / FIFA / etc.)
- [ ] Requested .md file format
- [ ] Set word count expectation (1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000)

---

## ðŸ’¡ PRO TIPS

**For Best Results:**
1. **Use official account screenshots** (verified checkmarks visible)
2. **Include variety:** Mix announcements, results, viral moments, athlete posts
3. **Show engagement metrics** when visible (likes, comments, shares)
4. **Capture timestamps** so I can verify "last 3 days" claims
5. **Mix platforms:** Instagram + TikTok + X gives fuller picture

**Avoid:**
- Blurry/low-quality images
- Uncaptioned photos (I need text to fact-check)
- Screenshots from random fan accounts
- Images without visible dates
- Memes without source context

**Correction Protocol:**
If you spot an error (like the qualification vs. finals issue), just reply:
> "Fact-check error: [specific issue]. Revise and send updated .md file."

I'll immediately correct and regenerate the full document.

---

## ðŸ”„ ITERATION OPTIONS

After receiving first version, you can request:

### Quick Adjustments
- "Add section on [specific athlete/event]"
- "Expand the [headline 3] section to 800 words"
- "Remove [headline 5], add content about [new topic]"

### Format Changes
- "Convert to slide deck outline (15 slides)"
- "Create social media thread version (15 tweets)"
- "Generate executive summary (500 words, keep only verified facts)"

### Tone Shifts
- "Make it more accessible for casual fans"
- "Increase technical depth for industry professionals"
- "Add more data/statistics throughout"

## ðŸ“š EXAMPLE VARIATIONS


### Example 3: Viral Moments Focus
```

Fact-check claims, explain why each went viral, provide content

.md format.
```

### Example 4: Regional Focus
```
UPSHOT Asia-Pacific sports digest: analyze these 7 posts from 
Japanese, Korean, Chinese, and Australian sports federations. 
Cover January 14-19, 2026. 3,500 words, highlight regional 
patterns. .md format with bibliography.
```
